name: angular-squire
description: angularjs directive for squire rich text editor

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/css && ./node_modules/node-sass/bin/node-sass src/angular-squire.scss dist/css/angular-squire.css && echo '(if module? and module.exports then require("angular") else window.angular).module("angular-squire").run(["$templateCache", ($templateCache) -> $templateCache.put("angular-squire-main-template.html", """'"$(node_modules/html-minifier/cli.js --collapse-whitespace src/template.html)"'""")]);' | node_modules/coffee-script/bin/coffee -sc > dist/angular-squire-template.js && node_modules/coffee-script/bin/coffee  --compile --output dist src && cp src/angular-squire.scss dist/css && cat dist/angular-squire-icons.js >> dist/angular-squire.js && rm dist/angular-squire-icons.js && cat dist/angular-squire-template.js >> dist/angular-squire.js && rm dist/angular-squire-template.js && node_modules/uglifyjs/bin/uglifyjs --compress --mangle --screw-ie8 -- dist/angular-squire.js > dist/angular-squire.min.js

author: Catalant Technologies, Inc
